recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS 3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/digitallibraryoftennessee/DLTN_XSLT. mods.abstract: This is an interview done with Eleanor Richmond by the Mid-Memphis Improvement Association. In this interview Miss Richmond discusses her childhood growing up in Oxford, Mississippi, as well as her family history. Miss Richmond also discusses her time as a teacher and principal in Memphis Elementary Schools during segregation and integration.
